get.summary: Gets the list of metadata entities.

200.description: The body contains properties of azure emerging issues, which includes a list of status banner and status active events.
The body contains a list of azure emerging issues.

get.description: Lists current service health events in the subscription.

200.description: The list of current service health events in the subscription

get.description: Lists current service health events for given resource.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified ID of the resource, including the resource name and resource type. Currently the API support not nested and one nesting level resource types : /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{resource-type}/{resource-name} and /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{parentResourceType}/{parentResourceName}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

200.description: The list of current service health events for given resource

get.description: Lists the current availability status for impacted resources in the subscription.

200.description: The list of current availability status for impacted resources in the subscription

get.description: Lists the current availability status for all the resources in the subscription.

200.description: The list of current availability status for all the resources in the subscription

get.description: Lists the current availability status for all the resources in the resource group.

200.description: The list of current availability status for all the resources in the resource group

get.description: Gets current availability status for a single resource

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified ID of the resource, including the resource name and resource type. Currently the API support not nested and one nesting level resource types : /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{resource-type}/{resource-name} and /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{parentResourceType}/{parentResourceName}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

200.description: The current availability status for a single resource

get.description: Lists all historical availability transitions and impacting events for a single resource.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified ID of the resource, including the resource name and resource type. Currently the API support not nested and one nesting level resource types : /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resource-group-name}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{resource-type}/{resource-name} and /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resource-provider-name}/{parentResourceType}/{parentResourceName}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

200.description: The list of historical availability statuses for a single resource

get.description: Lists available operations for the resourcehealth resource provider

200.description: The list of available operations for the resourcehealth resource provider

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of events. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of events.

impactStartTime.description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event started.

impactMitigationTime.description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event resolved.

impact.description: List services impacted by the service health event.

message.description: Recommended action title for the service health event.

actions.description: Recommended actions for the service health event.

items.description: Recommended action for the service health event.

groupId.description: Recommended action group Id for the service health event.

localeCode.description: Recommended action locale for the service health event.

faqs.description: Frequently asked questions for the service health event.

isHIR.description: It provides information if the event is High incident rate event or not.

enableMicrosoftSupport.description: Tells if we want to enable or disable Microsoft Support for this event.

description.description: Contains the communication message for the event, that could include summary, root cause and other details.

platformInitiated.description: Is true if the event is platform initiated.

enableChatWithUs.description: Tells if we want to enable or disable Microsoft Support for this event.

priority.description: Priority level of the event. Has value from 0 to 23. 0 is the highest priority. Service issue events have higher priority followed by planned maintenance and health advisory. Critical events have higher priority followed by error, warning and informational. Furthermore, active events have higher priority than resolved.

lastUpdateTime.description: It provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event was last updated.

link.description: Useful links for service health event.

extensionName.description: It provides the name of portal extension to produce link for given service health event.

bladeName.description: It provides the name of portal extension blade to produce link for given service health event.

parameters.description: It provides a map of parameter name and value for portal extension blade to produce lik for given service health event.

faq.description: Frequently asked question for the service health event

question.description: FAQ question for the service health event.

answer.description: FAQ answer for the service health event.

localeCode.description: FAQ locale for the service health event.

impact.description: Azure service impacted by the service health event.

impactedRegions.description: List regions impacted by the service health event.

impactedServiceRegion.description: Azure region impacted by the service health event.

status.description: Current status of event in the region.

impactedSubscriptions.description: List subscription impacted by the service health event.

items.description: Subscription impacted by the service health event.

lastUpdateTime.description: It provides the Timestamp for when the last update for the service health event.

updates.description: List of updates for given service health event.

summary.description: Summary text for the given update for the service health event.

updateDateTime.description: It provides the Timestamp for the given update for the service health event.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of impactedResourceStatus.

availabilityState.description: Impacted resource status of the resource.

title.description: Title description of the impacted resource status.

summary.description: Summary description of the impacted resource status.

reasonType.description: When the resource's availabilityState is Unavailable, it describes where the health impacting event was originated.

occuredTime.description: Timestamp for when last change in health status occurred.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of availabilityStatuses. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page of availabilityStatuses.

id.description: Azure Resource Manager Identity for the availabilityStatuses resource.

location.description: Azure Resource Manager geo location of the resource.

availabilityState.description: Availability status of the resource. When it is null, this availabilityStatus object represents an availability impacting event

summary.description: Summary description of the availability status.

reasonType.description: When the resource's availabilityState is Unavailable, it describes where the health impacting event was originated. Examples are planned, unplanned, user initiated or an outage etc.

rootCauseAttributionTime.description: When the resource's availabilityState is Unavailable, it provides the Timestamp for when the health impacting event was received.

healthEventType.description: In case of an availability impacting event, it describes when the health impacting event was originated. Examples are Lifecycle, Downtime, Fault Analysis etc.

healthEventCause.description: In case of an availability impacting event, it describes where the health impacting event was originated. Examples are PlatformInitiated, UserInitiated etc.

healthEventCategory.description: In case of an availability impacting event, it describes the category of a PlatformInitiated health impacting event. Examples are Planned, Unplanned etc.

healthEventId.description: It is a unique Id that identifies the event

resolutionETA.description: When the resource's availabilityState is Unavailable and the reasonType is not User Initiated, it provides the date and time for when the issue is expected to be resolved.

occuredTime.description: Timestamp for when last change in health status occurred.

reportedTime.description: Timestamp for when the health was last checked.

recentlyResolved.description: An annotation describing a change in the availabilityState to Available from Unavailable with a reasonType of type Unplanned

unavailableOccurredTime.description: Timestamp for when the availabilityState changed to Unavailable

resolvedTime.description: Timestamp when the availabilityState changes to Available.

unavailabilitySummary.description: Brief description of cause of the resource becoming unavailable.

recommendedActions.description: Lists actions the user can take based on the current availabilityState of the resource.

serviceImpactingEvents.description: Lists the service impacting events that may be affecting the health of the resource.

recommendedAction.description: Lists actions the user can take based on the current availabilityState of the resource.

actionUrlText.description: Substring of action, it describes which text should host the action url.

serviceImpactingEvent.description: Lists the service impacting events that may be affecting the health of the resource.

eventStartTime.description: Timestamp for when the event started.

eventStatusLastModifiedTime.description: Timestamp for when event was submitted/detected.

status.description: Status of the service impacting event.

incidentProperties.description: Properties of the service impacting event.

cloud.description: The cloud type of this banner.

lastModifiedTime.description: The last time modified on this banner.

emergingIssueImpact.description: Object of the emerging issue impact on services and regions.

regions.description: The list of impacted regions for corresponding emerging issues.

statusActiveEvent.description: Active event type of emerging issue.

trackingId.description: The tracking id of this active event.

startTime.description: The impact start time on this active event.

cloud.description: The cloud type of this active event.

severity.description: The severity level of this active event.

stage.description: The stage of this active event.

published.description: The boolean value of this active event if published or not.

lastModifiedTime.description: The last time modified on this banner.

impacts.description: The list of emerging issues impacts.

emergingIssue.description: On-going emerging issue from azure status.

refreshTimestamp.description: Timestamp for when last time refreshed for ongoing emerging issue.

statusBanners.description: The list of emerging issues of banner type.

statusActiveEvents.description: The list of emerging issues of active event type.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of emerging issues.

value.description: List of operations available in the resourcehealth resource provider.

operation.description: Operation available in the resourcehealth resource provider.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of metadata.

dependsOn.description: The list of keys on which this entity depends on.

applicableScenarios.description: The list of scenarios applicable to this metadata entity.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

IssueNameParameter.name: issueName
IssueNameParameter.description: The name of the emerging issue.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

FilterParameter.name: $filter
FilterParameter.description: The filter to apply on the operation. For more information please see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/apimanagement/apis?redirectedfrom=MSDN

ExpandParameter.name: $expand
ExpandParameter.description: Setting $expand=recommendedactions in url query expands the recommendedactions in the response.

EventIdParameter.name: eventId
EventIdParameter.description: EventId for the Service health event
